entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as one of the four houses at Hogwarts.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as being in Slytherin house.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who is talking to Harry and unwrapping the Frog.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is talking to Neville and looking at the Famous Wizard card.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is excited about the discovery of Nicolas Flamel.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as one of the four houses at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a famous wizard who defeated Grindelwald and worked with Nicolas Flamel on alchemy.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is a dark wizard who was defeated by Dumbledore in 1945.

entities.name: flamel
entities.description: Flamel is an alchemist who worked with Dumbledore and is mentioned on the Famous Wizard card.

entities.name: famous wizard card
entities.description: The Famous Wizard card contains information about Dumbledore's achievements.

relationships.description: Harry found the name of Nicolas Flamel on the Famous Wizard card.
Dumbledore worked with Nicolas Flamel on alchemy.
Harry and Ron collect the Famous Wizard cards.
